A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is wonderful. It is the opposite of the Force Awakens. It is bold/ ambitious and character driven. Luke is a broken revelation. However\, I am seeing many negative responses. Breaks my heart. These fans are the epitome of fanboy/ trolls. (MINOR SPOILER) Rather than appreciate the wonderful artwork here\, they argue about things like \"It should have been Obi-Wan\" or \"The Force doesn't do that!\" Actually\, these trolls don't know that. The force levitates. The force pushes . . . .I don't understand the hatred from trolls. Beautiful movie.
